answers.answer: is their something wrong with the baby that you have to get induced or you just want to?
First pregnancy induced. Nothing medically wrong with me or baby. Second pregnancy ill be induced on the 16th of November due to gestational diabetes
Its a decision like I signed a paper maybe a week ago my doctor said it was completly  my decision to do it instead of going an extra week. But everyone has there own opinion.
I dont see anything wrong with it
Okay thank you I just needed opinions.

question: Okay I had an doc app today ultrasound put on the monitor etc etc. So on 11/11/14 I have an app lll be 39 weeks and we were gonna talk about being induced that week. What do you ladies think? Nothing negative please..
title: 38 weeks & 1 Day.
